hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_ACTIVE, MENU_ICON, MENU_URL, PARENT_MENU_ID, SORT_ORDER, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM EO_MENU WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO EO_MENU ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, DESCRIPTION, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_ACTIVE, MENU_ICON, MENU_URL, PARENT_MENU_ID, SORT_ORDER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${MENU_ID}, ${MENU_NAME}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${MENU_ICON}, ${MENU_URL}, ${PARENT_MENU_ID}, ${SORT_ORDER}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE EO_MENU SET MENU_NAME = ${MENU_NAME}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, MENU_ICON = ${MENU_ICON}, MENU_URL = ${MENU_URL}, PARENT_MENU_ID = ${PARENT_MENU_ID}, SORT_ORDER = ${SORT_ORDER}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
